DOC.brief_summary: Ultrasound follow up for 9 months pregnancy in women underwent baraitric surgery before and after 1 year of surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Maternal and Neonatal Outcome in Pregnant Women Before and After 1 Year Since Bariatric Operation
DOC.detailed_description: Ultrasound follow up for 9 months pregnancy in women who had laparoscopic adjustable gastric banding done within last 1 year or earlier.
DOC.criteria: 1.Pregnant women in third trimester 2.after laparoscopic adjustable gastric banding done within last 1 year or earlier medical disorders affecting pregnancy as diabetes, hypertension, SLE
